body.p:
Police Court Cloverport Ky
Decr 24^th^. 1860
Commonwealth
vs } for selling Spiritous Liquors to a slave
Benjamin Hardin

The defendant having been fully heard in his defence upon the offence charged in the warrant the Jury brought in a verdict of guilty and asses'd his fine at twenty dollars & cost and this Court in obedience to the Statue further ordered that defendants license to sell Spirituous Liquors he & the same is hereby forfeited as for ^the term of^ three years from this date in accordance with the provisions of said Statute --
I hereby certify that the above is a true copy of the verdict & Judgement. Given under my hand this 15th February 1861

Jno C. Babbage
Police Judge of Cloverport
